title: Gorgeous Condo for Rent
posting_body: ['Live in this sleek, contemporary 1,100 sq ft one-bedroom soft loft in Minnetonka.', 'Rent includes all utilities (high speed internet, basic cable TV (~200 channels), gas, water and garbage) with the exception of electricity.', 'Unit has central AC.', 'Washer and dryer in unit.', 'This up-to-date soft loft features an open floor plan, 12 foot ceilings, stained concrete floors, and upgraded stainless steel appliances including a gas range and fridge with ice and water dispenser.', 'Enjoy beautiful sunsets through the nearly floor-to-ceiling exterior wall of windows overlooking the Minnetonka skyline.', 'The luxurious bathroom features double sinks, a counter-to-ceiling mirror, abundant storage space, glass shower and a separate soaker tub, all by Kohler.', 'Attached to the bedroom is a large walk-in closet with a built-in organizer.', "For your convenience, the unit's large storage room includes a washer and dryer.", 'For your safety, the unit is equipped with monitored fire detection sensors, a carbon monoxide detector as well as sprinklers.', 'This unit comes with two dedicated parking stalls which are in a secured, covered garage attached to the Cloud 9 building.', "The unit also includes a secured, temp-controlled locker in the building's ground level for additional storage.", 'Residents have free access to a rooftop community patio which features grills, a pergola, many places to sit, eat and relax, a lawn for yard games, and an outdoor gas fireplace.', 'The building includes a secured fitness center equipped with treadmills, ellipticals, free- and machine-weights, television and WIFI.', 'The unit is located in the Cloud 9 Skyflats building which is situated just west of Highway 169 and north of Highway 62 which is minutes away from downtown Hopkins, Edina, Eden Prairie and St. Louis Park.', 'Rent Amount: $1,795', 'Deposit Amount: $1,795', 'Building Type: Condo', 'Furnishings: Unfurnished', 'Pet Policy: No pets', 'Bedrooms: 1', 'Bathrooms: 1', 'SQFT (approx): 1,100 sqft', 'Washer/Dryer: Included in unit', 'Parking Spaces: 2 dedicated stalls', 'Lease Terms: Minimum 1 year', 'Our selection criteria process considers the following:', '- All applicants are subject to a credit, criminal and eviction background check which is $39 and non-refundable.', 'All adults must apply.', '- You must have a clean criminal background without felonies for at least 7 years.', "- Applicant's monthly household income must exceed three times the rent.", 'All income must be from a verifiable source.', 'Unverifiable income will not be considered.', 'Applicant must exhibit a responsible financial life.', '- Applicant may not have any evictions or unpaid judgments from previous landlords.', '- Applicant must be a non\xad‐smoker.', '- Applicant must have current photo identification and a valid social security number.', 'Rent includes all utilities (gas for stove and heat, high speed internet, basic cable TV (~200 Channels), water and garbage) with the exception of electricity.', 'This is a monthly value of ~$150-200.', 'Unit has central AC and washer/dryer in unit.']
